title: Don’t fall for this FAKE picture of Kanhaiya Kumar; here’s the fact check | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of former JNU Student Union president, Kanhaiya Kumar, has surfaced on the internet in which he can be seen with a shoe tied to his face.

ALSO READ: Actor Jaaved Jaaferi did not tweet this, here’s the fact check

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be morphed.

On putting the picture through a Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture in which there is no shoe.

In fact, on closely analysing the picture, we noticed that the original picture was flipped before superimposing a shoe on Kanhaiya’s face using a photo editing software.

Hence, the above analysis proves that the picture in question is FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
